error.signature: WARNING: One or more build-args were not consumed: ARG_NAME

verdict.summary: Docker build-arg passed but not used in Dockerfile. Typo or missing ARG instruction.

dead_ends.why_fails: The build-arg is probably needed â€” something is misconfigured

workarounds.action: Add ARG instruction in the Dockerfile: ARG ARG_NAME
Check for typos between --build-arg name and ARG name in Dockerfile
workarounds.how: Check for typos between --build-arg name and ARG name in Dockerfile

workarounds.action: In multi-stage builds, ARG must be declared in each stage that uses it
workarounds.how:
# ARG is scoped to the build stage:
FROM node:20 AS builder
ARG APP_VERSION  # Must declare here
RUN echo $APP_VERSION

FROM node:20-slim
ARG APP_VERSION  # Must declare AGAIN in this stage
LABEL version=$APP_VERSION

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'WARNING' is a build_warning error while 'Error starting userland proxy' has a different failure mode despite similar symptoms. Check error message details to differentiate.
